column1: Kata Robata////There have been many comparisons between Kata and Uchi
column2: and it seems to me those reviews miss the point.   The food is excellent at both places
column3: but the ambience is almost opposite.   Uchi is quiet and relaxing
column4: quiet enough that the waitstaff and serving assistants calmly explain each dish as it comes out to you
column5: and work with you to help make the right selections.   It is a great place to go if you actually want to talk to your date.
